issue.title: [CF 967] bug: AceGUI lib included twice in TMW 7.0.2
issue.body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. upgraded from 7.0.1-8-g6e50d97  to 7.0.2
2. check to see what files have been changed
3. notice that the AceGUI lib appears multiple times

What do you expect to happen? What happens instead?
is it really necessary to have it multiple times in the same addon?

What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version)
7.0.2

Do you have an error log of what happened?
not generating lua errors

Please provide any additional information below (including any export strings if applicable; see above.)
see screenshot


> Posted by CurseForge user Adrian_G2 | Imported from CurseForge issue #967 | Raw

comments.body:
Attachment Added: tmw_bug_duplicate_libs.png

tmw_bug_duplicate_libs.png

<p>diff between yesterday's installed addon file list and today's</p>


> Posted by CurseForge user Adrian_G2

This has been the case for all release versions of TellMeWhen since it first started using AceGUI-3.0-SharedMediaWidgets. Its just the way that the packager works. There is no harm done by this. Those files don't even get looked at or loaded unless the library is loaded as a standalone addon, which it isn't. LibStub, for example, is included 8 times throughout TellMeWhen's libraries.

Edited Jul 12, 2014

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
